task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 9°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure.
I have looked up but still need a better view of the building's base to estimate its full height accurately.
I need to move closer to the building to get a better perspective for estimating its height.
